localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Influencers, Superpage gives a new way to fund your passion by responding to fan messages. By setting up your unique contact page, you can now let anyone send a message by paying what they want.
blogPost.body: Influencers, Superpage gives a new way to fund your passion by responding to fan messages. By setting up your unique contact page, you can now let anyone send a message by paying what they want.
blogPost.title: Superpage - A contact page for influencers
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 有影响力的人，Superpage提供了一种新的方式，通过回复粉丝信息来资助你的热情。通过设置您独特的联系页面，您现在可以让任何人通过支付他们想要的费用来发送消息。
localize.tagline: 有影响力的人的联系页面

localize.description: 有影響力的人，Superpage提供了一種新的方式，通過回覆粉絲信息來資助你的熱情。通過設置您獨特的聯繫頁面，您現在可以讓任何人通過支付他們想要的費用來發送消息。
localize.tagline: 有影響力的人的聯繫頁面

previous.excerpt: Bitwit has the vision of making Bitcoin a commonly accepted currency. We enable Bitcoin holders to see where they can spent their money. Bitwit also helps people understand what their daily purchases cost in Bitcoin using the Bitcoin Daily feature.
previous.title: Bitwit - Find companies that accept bitcoin as payment

localize.description: Bitwit的愿景是让比特币成为一种普遍接受的货币。我们让比特币的持有者能够看到他们的钱可以花在哪里。Bitwit还通过Bitcoin Daily功能帮助人们了解他们每天购买比特币的成本。
localize.tagline: 寻找接受比特币支付的公司

localize.description: Bitwit的願景是讓比特幣成爲一種普遍接受的貨幣。我們讓比特幣的持有者能夠看到他們的錢可以花在哪裏。Bitwit還通過Bitcoin Daily功能幫助人們瞭解他們每天購買比特幣的成本。
localize.tagline: 尋找接受比特幣支付的公司

next.excerpt: Oneteam can be used by enterprises across all industries and team sizes to ensure efficient team communication. It provides a secure communication interface where companies can ensure that the employees- remote or otherwise can communicate over VoIP
next.title: Oneteam - Team collaboration software

localize.description: Oneteam可以被所有行业和团队规模的企业使用，以确保高效的团队沟通。它提供了一个安全的通信接口，企业可以确保员工--远程或其他方式可以通过VoIP进行通信。
Oneteam可以被所有行業和團隊規模的企業使用，以確保高效的團隊溝通。它提供了一個安全的通信接口，企業可以確保員工--遠程或其他方式可以通過VoIP進行通信。
